title: Interview with TM Squidgy and AE Pabu about the recent OPL finals and promotion tournament.

embed.description: 0:59 - OPL Finals, Dire Wolves vs Legacy 5:06 - The OPL Gauntlet (Sinderella Story) and Sin Gaming 25:06 - Abyss vs Tainted Minds 36:40 - Promotion Tournament 42:40 - New Talent in OPL in Split 2 45:20 - Regicide and the Legitimacy of their Qualification 51:30 - Squidgys thoughts on Tainted Minds Re-qualification 54:07 - Pabu and Squidgy's time in OCS 55:27 - OCS Bans 59:28 - Pabu Experiences with Tainted Minds 1:01:40 - Recruitment to OPL 1:13:15 - Plans for Split 2

body:
Interview about the OPL finals and promotion tournament, as well as some questions about their time playing in OPL and what their plans are for the future.

Hope you all enjoy :)
